Package br.com.demo.crud.crudbackend.controller

Class PersonController

java.lang.Object
br.com.demo.crud.crudbackend.controller.PersonController
@RestController @RequestMapping("rs/person") public class PersonController extends Object
The class CountryController is a request handler that directs the flow of person entity data.

      @PutMapping("{id}") PersonDTO update(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestBody PersonDTO personDTO)
      HTTP PUT request to handle the replacement of resources at the known url of person entity data
      Parameters:
      id - identifies the data that will be replaced

      new identifier for the entity
